text: aap se pehle hum ne basti walo mein jitne rasool bheje hai sub mard hee thein jin ki taraf hum wahi naazil farmaate gaye, kya zameen mein chal phir kar unhone dekha nahi ke un se pehle ke logo ka kaisa kuch anjaam hoa? yaqinan aaqirath ka ghar parhezgaaro ke liye bahuth hee behtar hai, kya phir bhi tum nahi samajhte
